title: Rottweiller jumps into a pond to rescue its owner from a pond
text:
This is the reassuring moment a dog owner called his pet Rottweiler to save him when he pretended to drown in a pond in Hung Yen, Vietnam.

In footage of the incident, the man, who is treading water in the pond, calls out his dog's name.

The dog, on hearing his name called out races to the scene, first ducking through a wire tunnel before bounding his way towards the circular pond.

The Rottweiler races towards his owner after hearing the plea for help in Hung Yen, Vietnam

The dog leaps into the pond having seen its owner splashing and struggling in the water

The dog, whose name is not known, finds some steps that lead down to the water and dives in.

As the owner splashes in the water, the dog paddles over and grabs the man's hand between his powerful jaws.

However, luckily for the man, the dog does not clamp down and tows him to the steps and safety.
description: This is the hilarious moment a dog owner called his pet Rottweiler to save him when he pretended to drown in a pond in Hung Yen, Vietnam.
